mapper.insert: insert into member(me_email, me_pw, me_birth, me_post_code, me_addr, me_addr_detail, me_code) values(#{me_email},#{me_pw},#{me_birth},#{me_post_code},#{me_addr},#{me_addr_detail},#{me_code})
mapper.update: update member set me_pos = #{me_pos} where me_email = #{me_email}
update member set me_pos_count = me_pos_count + 1 where me_email = #{me_email}
update member set me_s_id = #{me_s_id}, me_s_limit = #{me_s_limit} where me_email = #{me_email}
mapper.select: select * from member where me_s_id = #{me_s_id} and me_s_limit > now()
